mapper.sql:
FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND codeSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND cg_seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.codeSeq ,a.name ,a.replaceCode ,a.codeGroupSeq ,a.delNy ,(select name from codeGroup aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.codeGroupSeq = aa.codeGroupSeq) as codegroupname ,(select CodeGroupCode from CodeGroup aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.cg_seq = aa.seq) as codegroupcode
ORDER BY a.codeSeq DESC

SELECT a.codeSeq ,a.name ,a.codeGroupSeq ,a.delNy ,(select name from codeGroup aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.codeGroupSeq = aa.codeGroupSeq) as codegroupname ,(select CodeGroupCode from CodeGroup aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.cg_seq = aa.seq) as codegroupcode FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND a.codeSeq = #{codeSeq}
SELECT codeSeq ,replaceCode ,name ,codeGroupSeq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0
